Package: com.github.tagc.semver

[Groovy] Class GitBranchDetector

    • com.github.tagc.semver.GitBranchDetector

    • This entity is used to attempt to retrieve the name of the currently checked-out Git branch within a Git repository.

      Authors:
      davidfallah
      Since:
      v0.5.0

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          GitBranchDetector (org.gradle.api.Project project)
          Instantiates a GitBranchDetector that attempts to open a Git repository in the project base directory.
          GitBranchDetector (java.io.File repoDir)
          Instantiates a GitBranchDetector that attempts to open a Git repository in the given directory.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String getBranch()
          Returns the name of the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked.
          boolean isOnHotfixBranch()
          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is a hotfix branch.
          boolean isOnMasterBranch()
          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is the master branch.
          boolean isOnReleaseBranch()
          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is a release branch.
          Version tryParseBranchVersion()
          Tries to parse the version of the currently checked-out release or hotfix Git branch.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          class java.lang.Object java.lang.Object#wait(long, int), java.lang.Object#wait(long), java.lang.Object#wait(), java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object), java.lang.Object#toString(), java.lang.Object#hashCode(), java.lang.Object#getClass(), java.lang.Object#notify(), java.lang.Object#notifyAll()

      • Constructor Detail

        • GitBranchDetector(org.gradle.api.Project project)

          Instantiates a GitBranchDetector that attempts to open a Git repository in the project base directory.

          throws:
          Grgit if no Git repository exists in the project base directory to be opened
          Parameters:
          project - a Gradle project

        • GitBranchDetector(java.io.File repoDir)

          Instantiates a GitBranchDetector that attempts to open a Git repository in the given directory.

          throws:
          Grgit if no Git repository exists in the given file location to be opened
          Parameters:
          repoDir - the file location of the Git repository to open

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.String getBranch()

          Returns the name of the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked.

          Returns:
          the current Git branch name

        • boolean isOnHotfixBranch()

          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is a hotfix branch.

          Returns:
          true if the currently checked-out branch is a hotfix branch

        • boolean isOnMasterBranch()

          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is the master branch.

          Returns:
          true if the currently checked-out branch is the master branch

        • boolean isOnReleaseBranch()

          Returns whether the currently checked-out Git branch in the Git repository being tracked is a release branch.

          Returns:
          true if the currently checked-out branch is a release branch

        • Version tryParseBranchVersion()

          Tries to parse the version of the currently checked-out release or hotfix Git branch.

          Before calling this method, it is advised to check that the project is on a release or hotfix branch.

          throws:
          IllegalStateException if the project is not on a hotfix or release Git branch
          Returns:
          an instance of Version matching the branch version if it could be parsed, otherwise null
          See Also:
          isOnReleaseBranch
          isOnHotfixBranch
